title: S12 Ep184: The Black Vault
itunes:title: The Black Vault
description:
John Greenewald Jr. had a fascination with UFO's as a teenager and wanted answers. So, he went straight to the source... The U.S. Government? John began assembling records from the government through the Freedom of Information Act, first on UFO's, then on other topics, he now has over 1.5 million pages of documents available online and joins Beyond The Darkness to talk about his and our relationship with our government, disclosure, If aliens are real, and other intriguing topics!

John Greenewald Jr.: http://www.theblackvault.com/
